kpi.name: RNC_1851a
kpi.formula:
decode( (rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_1 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_2 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_3 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_4 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_5 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_6 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_7 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_8 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_9 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_10 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_11 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_12 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_13 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_14 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_15 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_16 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_17 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_18 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_19 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_20),0,null,
(100*(rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_7) / (rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_1 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_2 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_3 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_4 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_5 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_6 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_7 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_8 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_9 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_10 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_11 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_12 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_13 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_14 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_15 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_16 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_17 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_18 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_19 + rtprtcp.rtp_jitter_class_20)))

kpi_info.title: RTP Jitter Class 7 Share
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the share of RTP jitter samples, from total number of samples, that bellong to Jitter Class 7.
kpi_info.formula:
100 * SUM(RTP_JITTER_CLASS_7)
------------------
SUM (RTP_JITTER_CLASS_1
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_2
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_3
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_4
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_5
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_6
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_7
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_8
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_9
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_10
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_11
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_12
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_13
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_14
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_15
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_16
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_17
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_18
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_19
+ RTP_JITTER_CLASS_20)
